name: VerbTest
description: Tests for various verb forms generated by the Faker library.

test_cases.name: testBase
test_cases.description: Tests the base form of verbs generated by the Faker library.

test_cases.name: testPast
test_cases.description: Tests the past form of verbs generated by the Faker library.

test_cases.name: testPastParticiple
test_cases.description: Tests the past participle form of verbs generated by the Faker library.

test_cases.name: testSimplePresent
test_cases.description: Tests the simple present form of verbs generated by the Faker library.

test_cases.name: testIngForm
test_cases.description: Tests the ing form of verbs generated by the Faker library.
